recipes.bio: Foods are any substances that are consumed to provide nutritional support for th
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. 2. Season the beef tenderloin with salt and pepper. 3. Sear the beef on all sides in a hot skillet. 4. Spread mustard on the beef. 5. Layer the prosciutto and mushrooms on top. 6. Wrap in puff pastry. 7. Brush with egg wash. 8. Bake for 35-40 minutes.

recipes.bio: Foods are any substances that are consumed to provide nutritional support for th
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Crack eggs into a bowl. 2. Melt butter in a skillet. 3. Add eggs to skillet. 4. Stir constantly. 5. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Garnish with chives.

recipes.bio: Foods are any substances that are consumed to provide nutritional support for th
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cut beef into thin strips. 2. Sauté beef, onion, and mushrooms in a skillet. 3. Add sour cream. 4. Cook egg noodles according to package instructions. 5. Serve beef stroganoff over egg noodles.
